heisigStory: Geppetto made walking legs for his little Pinocchio from two twigs of a tree, giving him a set of "twiggy" shanks.
koohiiStory1: They all say they have a TREE between their WALKING LEGS but most only have a TWIG.
koohiiStory2: Don´t confuse with branch or bough - think of snapping twigs. A twig is always the kind of wood that snaps when the hunter´s walking legs just barely touch it, making a snapping sound that alerts the prey to the hunter´s presence.
myStory: nhánh cây. phần nhánh trồi ra khỏi cây sau cùng.
